languages.text: "Как ловко вы записали меня в безмолвные болванчики. Напомню, что я отчитываюсь непосредственно маршалу и делаю это во всей полноте".
"What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless henchman. Let me also remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reports are thorough."
languages.original_text: "Как ловко вы записали меня в безмолвные болванчики. Напомню, что я отчитываюсь непосредственно маршалу и делаю это во всей полноте".

traits.locale_text: "What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless dummy. Let me remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reporting is thorough."
"What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless dummy. Let me remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reporting is thorough."
"What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless dummy. Let me remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reports are thorough."
"What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless dummy. Let me remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reports are thorough."
"What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless henchman. Let me also remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reports are thorough."
"What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless henchman. Let me also remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reports are thorough."

languages.text: “真是狡猾的说辞，把我描述成了没有脑子的走狗。也请允许我提醒你，我会将这一切报告给元帅本人，我的报告会非常详尽。”
languages.original_text: "What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless henchman. Let me also remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reports are thorough."

traits.locale_text: “真是狡猾的说辞，把我描述成了没有脑子的走狗。也请允许我提醒你，我会将这一切报告给元帅本人，我的报告会非常详尽。”

languages.text: 「なんてずる賢い方法で、俺を愚かな取り巻きのように言うんだ。私は将帥に直接報告し、報告書が最終的なものであるということを覚えておくんだな」
languages.original_text: "What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless henchman. Let me also remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reports are thorough."

traits.locale_text: 「なんてずる賢い方法で、俺を愚かな取り巻きのように言うんだ。私は将帥に直接報告し、報告書が最終的なものであるということを覚えておくんだな」

languages.text: «Qué forma tan sutil de retratarme como un esbirro descerebrado. Permítame recordarle también que respondo directamente al mariscal, y que mis informes son muy concienzudos».
languages.original_text: "What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless henchman. Let me also remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reports are thorough."

traits.locale_text: «Qué forma tan sutil de retratarme como un esbirro descerebrado. Permítame recordarle también que respondo directamente al mariscal, y que mis informes son muy concienzudos».

languages.text: "Kurnazlıkla beni akılsız bir yardakçı gibi göstermeye çalışıyorsun. O hâlde size doğrudan Miralay'a rapor verdiğimi ve raporlarımın epey kapsamlı olduğunu hatırlatayım."
languages.original_text: "What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless henchman. Let me also remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reports are thorough."

traits.locale_text: "Kurnazlıkla beni akılsız bir yardakçı gibi göstermeye çalışıyorsun. O hâlde size doğrudan Miralay'a rapor verdiğimi ve raporlarımın epey kapsamlı olduğunu hatırlatayım."

languages.text: « Quelle délicate façon de me faire passer pour un homme de main sans cervelle. Permettez-moi également de vous rappeler que je rends directement compte au maréchal et que mes rapports sont minutieux. »
languages.original_text: "What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless henchman. Let me also remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reports are thorough."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle délicate façon de me faire passer pour un homme de main sans cervelle. Permettez-moi également de vous rappeler que je rends directement compte au maréchal et que mes rapports sont minutieux. »

languages.text: "Ein raffinierter Schachzug, um mich als hirnlosen Schergen abzustempeln. Aber darf ich Euch daran erinnern, dass ich dem Marschall direkt Bericht erstatte, und meine Berichte sind umfassend."
languages.original_text: "What a crafty way to paint me as a mindless henchman. Let me also remind you that I report directly to the Marshal, and my reports are thorough."

traits.locale_text: "Ein raffinierter Schachzug, um mich als hirnlosen Schergen abzustempeln. Aber darf ich Euch daran erinnern, dass ich dem Marschall direkt Bericht erstatte, und meine Berichte sind umfassend."
